title: Athletism — Striking (Elite) — Phase 2: Work Capacity & Chassis
equipment: Heavy bag, pads, focus mitts, kick shield
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Protective gear (gloves, wraps, shin guards, mouthpiece)
goal: Build repeatability for sparring, trunk endurance, shoulder capacity.

main: Strength: Front Squat 5x5, Bench Pull 4x8, RDL 4x8
Circuit EMOM: sled push 20m / med ball slam 8 / burpee 6
cooldown: Soft tissue release 10' (foam roll, lacrosse ball)

notes: Week 1: EMOM 20'. Week 2: EMOM 24' + light padwork.
